select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from staff_info
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.update:
update staff_info
stff_id = #{stffId,jdbcType=CHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=CHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR},
cellphone = #{cellphone,jdbcType=CHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=CHAR},
id_crd = #{idCrd,jdbcType=CHAR},
hshld_addrss = #{hshldAddrss,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nation = #{nation,jdbcType=CHAR},
lv_addrss = #{lvAddrss,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brnch_cmpny = #{brnchCmpny,jdbcType=CHAR},
department = #{department,jdbcType=CHAR},
sgn_addrss = #{sgnAddrss,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sgn_dt = #{sgnDt,jdbcType=CHAR},
cntrct_type = #{cntrctType,jdbcType=CHAR},
cntrct_bgn = #{cntrctBgn,jdbcType=CHAR},
cntrct_end = #{cntrctEnd,jdbcType=CHAR},
slry_crd = #{slryCrd,jdbcType=CHAR},
expns_crd = #{expnsCrd,jdbcType=CHAR},
stff_state = #{stffState,jdbcType=CHAR},
grdt_schl = #{grdtSchl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
schl_rcrd = #{schlRcrd,jdbcType=CHAR},
grdt_dt = #{grdtDt,jdbcType=CHAR},
nt_unt = #{ntUnt,jdbcType=CHAR},
tchnldg_lv = #{tchnldgLv,jdbcType=CHAR},
idntfy_unt = #{idntfyUnt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
accnt_type = #{accntType,jdbcType=CHAR},
accnt_state = #{accntState,jdbcType=CHAR},
wtr_itm = #{wtrItm,jdbcType=CHAR},
wtr_ordr = #{wtrOrdr,jdbcType=CHAR},
where sqnc_nmbr = #{sqncNmbr,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update staff_info set stff_id = #{stffId,jdbcType=CHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=CHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, cellphone = #{cellphone,jdbcType=CHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=CHAR}, id_crd = #{idCrd,jdbcType=CHAR}, hshld_addrss = #{hshldAddrss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nation = #{nation,jdbcType=CHAR}, lv_addrss = #{lvAddrss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brnch_cmpny = #{brnchCmpny,jdbcType=CHAR}, department = #{department,jdbcType=CHAR}, sgn_addrss = #{sgnAddrss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sgn_dt = #{sgnDt,jdbcType=CHAR}, cntrct_type = #{cntrctType,jdbcType=CHAR}, cntrct_bgn = #{cntrctBgn,jdbcType=CHAR}, cntrct_end = #{cntrctEnd,jdbcType=CHAR}, slry_crd = #{slryCrd,jdbcType=CHAR}, expns_crd = #{expnsCrd,jdbcType=CHAR}, stff_state = #{stffState,jdbcType=CHAR}, grdt_schl = #{grdtSchl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, schl_rcrd = #{schlRcrd,jdbcType=CHAR}, grdt_dt = #{grdtDt,jdbcType=CHAR}, nt_unt = #{ntUnt,jdbcType=CHAR}, tchnldg_lv = #{tchnldgLv,jdbcType=CHAR}, idntfy_unt = #{idntfyUnt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accnt_type = #{accntType,jdbcType=CHAR}, accnt_state = #{accntState,jdbcType=CHAR}, wtr_itm = #{wtrItm,jdbcType=CHAR}, wtr_ordr = #{wtrOrdr,jdbcType=CHAR} where sqnc_nmbr = #{sqncNmbr,jdbcType=INTEGER}
